Control Name: ACCOUNT MANAGEMENT | SHARED / GROUP ACCOUNT CREDENTIAL TERMINATION
Control Statement: The information system terminates shared/group account credentials when members leave the group.

control_attributes.description: The information system terminates shared/group account credentials when members leave the group.
control_attributes.AdditionalReq: AC-2 (10) Required if shared/group accounts are deployed
